title: Which of the following was true of the Northeas...

content.question: Which of the following was true of the Northeast American Indian tribes at the time Europeans first began colonization?

choices.label: Their economies depended entirely on hunting and gathering.
Their political and linguistic differences hindered their united opposition to the Europeans.
Their populations were immune to European diseases.
Their warriors rarely engaged in intertribal warfare.
Their cultures made no distinction between men’s work and women’s work.

content.answer: Their political and linguistic differences hindered their united opposition to the Europeans.

topic.text: 1.6: Cultural Interactions Between Europeans, Native Americans, and Africans

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
